summary: The DATA Act seeks to improve reporting on federal spending and make federal funds more transparent via USASpending.gov . Agencies began reporting using DATA Act standards in May 2017. Going forward, those standards may be changed to ensure that they are capturing useful data from agencies—specifically, data that is accurate, consistent, and comparable across government. title: Data Act: OMB Needs to Formalize Data Governance for Reporting Federal Spending
